QuestionTxt: As far as you know, would you say that average temperatures around the world have been higher in the last three years than before that, lower, or about the same?
SurveySponsor: Planet Green, The Woods Institute for the Environment at Stanford University
StudyNote: Interviews were conducted by TNS Intersearch.
